channel.title: How to get past a firewall easily
channel.description: 1. Click the start-menu 2. click run 3. type C:\WINDOWS\system32\command.com 4. in command type [code]ping WEBSITENAME.COM[/code] 5. it will say [code]pinging WEBSITENAME.COM [*.*.*.*] with 32 bytes of data[/code] 6. copy down the ip adress shown and type it into your browser for example - [code=runescape]runescape= 65.39.250.68[/code] 7. And you're done :)

item.title: How to get past a firewall easily
item.dc:creator: @craids craids
item.source: How to get past a firewall easily

item.title: How to get past a firewall easily
item.dc:creator: @shawnvwd shawnvwd
item.description:
@shawnvwd wrote:

  1. Click the start-menu
  2. click run
  3. type C:\WINDOWS\system32\command.com
  4. in command type ping WEBSITENAME.COM
  5. it will say pinging WEBSITENAME.COM [*.*.*.*] with 32 bytes of data
  6. copy down the ip adress shown and type it into your browser
    for example -
runescape= 65.39.250.68
  1. And you’re done

Read full topic
item.source: How to get past a firewall easily
